sentences.sContent: We are a company in the course of privatization, our shares to be issued next month.
sentences.sContent_eng: We are a company in the course of privatization, our shares to be issued next month.
sentences.sCn: 我方为一家正在向私有化转制的公司，我方股票将于下个月发行。 羺。

sentences.sContent: The threat of privatization and sack if you do not perform can only save this nation. The best example – BSNL.
sentences.sContent_eng: The threat of privatization and sack if you do not perform can only save this nation. The best example – BSNL.
sentences.sCn: 私有化的威胁，以及如果表现不好会被解雇，只能拯救国家。最好的例子是印度电信。

sentences.sContent: Yet those of us who looked at his policy proposals — big tax cuts for the rich and Social Security privatization — had a very different impression. And we were right.
sentences.sContent_eng: Yet those of us who looked at his policy proposals — big tax cuts for the rich and Social Security privatization — had a very different impression. And we were right.
sentences.sCn: 然而那些审视了他的施政方针——对富人减税和社会保障私有化——的人却对他有很不同的看法。而且这种不同看法被证实了。

words.tran: 私掠船；武装民船；私掠船船长；私掠船船员
